Package main.java.scheduler.util

Class DateTimeUtil

java.lang.Object
main.java.scheduler.util.DateTimeUtil
public final class DateTimeUtil extends Object
Utility class for date and time conversions and manipulations.

  • Method Details

    • convertToUTCString

      public static String convertToUTCString(LocalDate date, String hour, String minute, String meridiem)
      Converts the given date, hour, minute, and meridiem values to a UTC string. The values are collected from the appointment form.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to convert.
      hour - The hour value in 12-hour format.
      minute - The minute value.
      meridiem - The meridiem (AM/PM) value.
      Returns:
      The UTC string representation of the converted date and time.

    • convertToLocalZDT

      public static ZonedDateTime convertToLocalZDT(String timestampString)
      Converts the given UTC timestamp ZonedDateTime in the system's time zone. Timestamps are retrieved from the database in String format, parsed, and converted before being displayed in the scheduling application.
      Parameters:
      timestampString - The timestamp string to be converted

    • nowStringUTC

      public static String nowStringUTC()
      Returns the current time in UTC string format.

    • convertToUTC

      public static LocalTime convertToUTC(LocalTime localTime, LocalDate date)
      Converts the given time and date from system time to UTC

    • overlapsExistingAppointment

      public static boolean overlapsExistingAppointment(Appointment appointment, String newAppointmentStartString, String newAppointmentEndString)
      Checks whether the given appointment times overlap with an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The existing appointment
      newAppointmentStartString - The start time of the new appointment in string format
      newAppointmentEndString - The end time of the new appointment in string format
      Returns:
      Returns True if there is an overlap, otherwise False

    • checkTime

      public static String checkTime(String startString, String endString)
      Checks the validity of an appointment time slot based on the given start and end times. Returns an error message if the end time precedes the start time or if the appointment falls outside business hours. Otherwise, returns "valid" to indicate a valid appointment.
      Parameters:
      startString - The appointment start time
      endString - The appointment end time
      Returns:
      The validity status or error message in string format
